PSCT.Base: Reveal 3 "Danger!" monsters with different names from your Deck, your opponent randomly picks 1 for you to Special Summon, and you shuffle the rest into the Deck. During the End Phase, destroy that Special Summoned monster. You can only activate 1 "You're in Danger!" per turn.
